title: Hermes International 1st Half Net Profit, Revenue Rose
text:
By Max Bernhard

Hermes International SCA (RMS.FR) said Wednesday that first-half net profit and revenue rose, and backed its medium-term revenue outlook.

Hermes, which is best known for its leather bags, said net profit rose to 754 million euros ($832.6 million) from EUR706 million in the same period a year ago. Revenue rose 15% at current exchange rates to EUR3.28 billion, it said.

Hermes confirmed its medium-term outlook of revenue growth at constant exchange rates.
